ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 02:48:27. [Issue ID 977094]
ComicInfo.Summary: Panacea had trained Willow with the intention of killing her to gain more power (the more powerful the victim, the more power is released). Willow had fled Panacea and she tells Eddie how she had spent her life down through the following decades. The story is interrupted when they arrive at Willow's strip club. She gets all the strippers to go on stage at once so she can channel the power from the audience. When Panacea arrives, she uses all her power to hide a pentagram on stage. As Panacea steps into the pentagram, Willow uses a special banishment spell to send her away.
